description: 1 x Oak (applicants ref. T260) - Remove major deadwood throughout crown. Crown lift to 4.0m removing epicormic regrowth on main stem up to height of 3.0m. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Oak (applicants ref. T261) - Remove major deadwood throughout. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Oak (applicants ref. T263) - Fell.to remaining height of between 3-4m. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order.7 x Oak (applicants ref. T265, T268, T269, T271, T272, T274, T277) - Remove major deadwood throughout crown. Selective pruning of eastern crown to maintain clearance from school building up to 2m. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Oak (applicants ref. T267) - Remove major deadwood and hanger within crown. Crown lift removing epicormic regrowth on main stem up to 3m. Carry out selective pruning of the eastern crown up to 2m to maintain suitable clearance from building. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Oak (applicants ref. T270) - Fell to ground level. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Oak (applicants ref. T273) - Remove epicormic regrowth establishing on main stem up to 3m. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Oak (applicants ref. T276) - Remove. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Oak (applicants ref. T279) - Remove major deadwood throughout crown. Remove epicormic regrowth on lower stem. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Oak (applicants ref. T280) - Remove major deadwood throughout crown. Crown lift removing epicormic regrowth up to 3m. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
